SELECT BILLINGCYCLID,PAY_CHNL_ID,PAY_CHNL_NAME,DEV_CHNL_CODE,DEV_CHNL_NAME,REMARK,SUM(FEE) COMM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_FLOW_MON WHERE BILLINGCYCLID=TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'yyyymm') AND INIT_ID IS NULL
AND 1=2
AND GROUP_ID_1 = #{code}
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')
GROUP BY BILLINGCYCLID,PAY_CHNL_ID,PAY_CHNL_NAME,DEV_CHNL_CODE,DEV_CHNL_NAME,REMARK

SELECT NVL(SUM(FEE),0) FEE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_FLOW_MON WHERE BILLINGCYCLID=TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'yyyymm') AND INIT_ID IS NULL
AND 1=2
AND GROUP_ID_1 = #{code}
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')

SELECT NVL(SUM(FEE),0) FEE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_FLOW_MON WHERE INIT_ID=#{workNo}
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_FLOW_MON WHERE BILLINGCYCLID=TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'yyyymm') AND INIT_ID IS NULL
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')
AND 1=2
)
